SELECT F.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_STAR, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_OVERVIEW, NVL(P.P_SCALE, ' ') , P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_REFUND, R.ROOM_TYPE, R.ROOM_PRICE, R.ROOM_CAPACITY, R.ROOM_OPTION, F.FAC_ROOM, F.FAC_RESTARUANT, F.FAC_SECURITY, F.FAC_BATHROOM, F.FAC_PARKING, F.FAC_BED, NVL(F.FAC_LIVING, ' ') , F.FAC_MEDIA, F.FAC_INTERNET, F.FAC_SERVICE, F.FAC_GENERAL, F.FAC_LANGUAGE, F.FAC_KITCHEN, F.FAC_RECEPTION FROM PROPERTIES P INNER JOIN P_ROOMTYPE R ON P.ROOM_ID = R.ROOM_ID INNER JOIN PRO_FACILITIES F ON P.P_ID = F.P_ID
WHERE P.P_ID = #{P_ID}
